::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
# echo: false
p <- ggplot(zv_grilla_clusters) +
  theme_minimal() +
  geom_sf(aes(fill = clust_fac), color = "black") +
  coord_sf(datum = st_crs(5367)) +
  scale_fill_brewer(name = "Cluster", palette = "Dark2")
p
```

```{.r .cell-code}
zv_grilla_clusters_4 <- subset(zv_grilla_clusters, clust == 4)
```
